name: smart_price_prediction_agent_v2
description: A smart agent that predicts agricultural produce prices by consulting two specialist sub-agents for current (Google Search) and historical (Vertex AI Search) data.

skills.name: Data-Driven Crop Price Prediction
skills.description: Provides a price forecast and optimal selling time by synthesizing real-time web data and historical datastore trends.
examples: What is the forecast for wheat prices in Punjab?
Give me a detailed price prediction for tomatoes in Nashik
Should I sell my basmati rice now or wait?
